mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: The BOF/Management IP address of the controller

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: Gateway IP on the Management network

mgmt_static_route_list.title: Management Network Static Routes
mgmt_static_route_list.description: Static Route list to be configured on the management/BOF interface. Define as empty list if no static routes are to be configured.

ctrl_ip.title: Control IP address
ctrl_ip.description: The Control/Data IP address of the controller

vlan_id.title: Vlan ID for Control Interface
vlan_id.description: The VLAN ID for the uplink connection of the controller. This field is deprecated and will be removed in future releases. Use ctrl_ip_vprn_list instead.

ctrl_ip_vprn.title: Control IP address for VPRN Interface
ctrl_ip_vprn.description: The Control/Data VPRN IP address of the controller. This field is deprecated and will be removed in future releases. Use ctrl_ip_vprn_list instead.

ctrl_ip_vprn_list.title: List of control IP VPRNs
ctrl_ip_vprn_list.description: Comma Seperated list of control IP VPRNs. Each item in list is of format VLAN_ID:Control_IP_ADDR/NETMASK_LENGTH . Both Control IP address and Netmask length are optional

system_ip.title: System IP address
system_ip.description: Required for BGP pairing with peers

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the virtual machine on the Hypervisor/vCenter Server.

system_name.title: System Name
system_name.description: Name of the system if other than hostname

xmpp_username.title: XMPP username
xmpp_username.description: Unique username used to identify this VSC in its XMPP connection with VSD

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

data_bridge.title: Data Network Bridge
data_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the data path of a component or the Control interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM.

vsd_fqdn.title: VSD FQDN
vsd_fqdn.description: FQDN of the VSD or VSD cluster for this VSC

internal_mgmt_ip.title: Private Management IP
internal_mgmt_ip.description: Private Management IP Address of VSC instances

internal_ctrl_ip.title: Private Control IP Address
internal_ctrl_ip.description: Private Control IP Address of VSC Instances

internal_data_gateway_ip.title: Private Data Gateway IP Address
internal_data_gateway_ip.description: Private Data Gateway IP Address of VSC Instances

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_host_reference.title: vCenter Host Reference
vcenter_host_reference.description: Requires ovftool 4.3. Reference to the host on the vCenter cluster on which to deploy Nuage components

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

openstack_image.title: OpenStack Image
openstack_image.description: Name of image installed on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_flavor.title: OpenStack Flavor
openstack_flavor.description: Name of instance flavor installed on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_availability_zone.title: OpenStack Availability Zone
openstack_availability_zone.description: Name of availability zone on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_mgmt_network.title: OpenStack Mgmt Network
openstack_mgmt_network.description: Name of management network on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_mgmt_subnet.title: OpenStack Mgmt Subnet
openstack_mgmt_subnet.description: Name of management subnet on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_mgmt_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Mgmt Port Security Groups
openstack_mgmt_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Mgmt interface

openstack_control_network.title: OpenStack Control Network
openstack_control_network.description: Name of control network on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_control_subnet.title: OpenStack Control Subnet
openstack_control_subnet.description: Name of control subnet on OpenStack for VSC

openstack_control_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Control Port Security Groups
openstack_control_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Control interface

openstack_port_security_groups.title: OpenStack Port Security Groups
openstack_port_security_groups.description: Set of security groups to associate with Mgmt interface

expected_num_bgp_peers.title: Expected number of BGP neighbors
expected_num_bgp_peers.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_vswitches.title: Expected number of vswitches
expected_num_vswitches.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_host_vports.title: Expected number of host vports
expected_num_host_vports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_vm_vports.title: Expected number of VM vports
expected_num_vm_vports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_gateway_ports.title: Expected number of gateway ports
expected_num_gateway_ports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

ejabberd_id.title: Ejabberd user id
ejabberd_id.description: Ejabberd user id used to create the certificate

private_key_path.title: Private key path
private_key_path.description: Path to VSC certificate key pem file

certificate_path.title: Certificate path
certificate_path.description: Path to VSC certificate pem file

ca_certificate_path.title: CA certificate path
ca_certificate_path.description: Path to CA certificate pem file

xmpp_domain.title: XMPP domain
xmpp_domain.description: XMPP domain used in custom certificates

credentials_set.title: Credentials set name
credentials_set.description: Name of the credentials set for the vsc

cpuset.title: KVM cpuset information
cpuset.description: Cpuset information for cpu pinning on KVM. For example, VSC requires 4 cores and sample values will be of the form [ 0, 1, 2, 3 ]
